comment: Universal fallback configuration for all sites. Site-specific configs will override these defaults.

start.comment: Dynamically find the first email on the page as the starting point

end.comment: Use viewport height to determine the end boundary

scrollBehavior.comment: Conservative scroll settings to avoid rate limiting and ensure content loads properly

selectors.comment: OPTIONAL performance hints for DOM extraction. Set to null to use auto-detection (recommended).

parsing.comment: profileUrlPatterns are URL fragments that indicate profile pages.

pagination.comment: Auto-detect pagination pattern. Can be overridden with: 'parameter', 'path', 'offset', 'cursor', or 'none'

discovery.comment: Discovery settings for automatic pagination detection

patterns.comment: Optional manual patterns for pagination. Leave null for auto-detection.

validation.comment: Validation rules to detect when pagination should stop
